title: Infiniti Wahana Buys 4.13 Million Shares of Steady Safe Tbk
body: Infiniti Wahana acquired 4,136,200 shares of PT Steady Safe Tbk (SAFE.JK) on December 19, 2025. The transaction was executed at a price of IDR 356 per share. Following this purchase, Infiniti Wahana's holdings increased from 460,460,813 shares to 464,597,013 shares.

title: Junichiro Waide Sells 8.65 Million Shares of PT Venteny Fortuna International Tbk
body: Junichiro Waide has sold 8,650,000 shares of PT Venteny Fortuna International Tbk (VTNY.JK). The transaction occurred on December 19, 2025, at a price of IDR 95.82 per share. Following the sale, Waide's holdings decreased by 8,650,000 shares, from 1,298,016,974 to 1,289,366,974 shares.

title: Agung Sedayu Sells 1.1 Billion Shares of PT Bangun Kosambi Sukses Tbk
body: Agung Sedayu has sold 1,105,937,178 shares of PT Bangun Kosambi Sukses Tbk (CBDK.JK). The transaction occurred on December 19, 2025, with shares sold at IDR 6,450 each. Following the sale, Agung Sedayu's holdings decreased from 1,250,000,000 shares to 144,062,822 shares.

title: Eddy Purwana Wikanta Sells 2.2 Million Shares of PT Nusa Raya Cipta Tbk
body: Eddy Purwana Wikanta, Ir has sold 2,200,000 shares of PT Nusa Raya Cipta Tbk (NRCA.JK). The transaction occurred on December 19, 2025, with shares sold at IDR 2,031.27 per share. Following the sale, Mr. Wikanta's holdings decreased from 61,352,500 shares to 59,152,500 shares.

title: Ram Jethmal Punjabi Buys 2,797,400 Shares of PT Tripar Multivision Plus Tbk
body: Ram Jethmal Punjabi has acquired 2,797,400 shares of PT Tripar Multivision Plus Tbk (RAAM.JK) at a price of IDR 234.99 per share. This transaction increases his total holdings from 4,596,669,982 to 4,599,467,382 shares. The purchase was made on December 19, 2025.

title: Bank Of Singapore Sells 100 Million Shares of PT Paramita Bangun Sarana Tbk
body: Bank Of Singapore Limited has sold 100,000,000 shares of PT Paramita Bangun Sarana Tbk (PBSA.JK). The transaction resulted in a decrease in holdings from 220,252,900 shares to 120,252,900 shares. The sale occurred on December 19, 2025.

title: Samuel Sekuritas Indonesia Buys 569,458,100 Shares of Sentul City Tbk
body: Samuel Sekuritas Indonesia has increased its stake in Sentul City Tbk (BKSL.JK) through a purchase of 569,458,100 shares. The transaction, which occurred on December 19, 2025, was executed at a price of IDR 133 per share. Following this acquisition, Samuel Sekuritas Indonesia's holdings in Sentul City Tbk rose from 8,276,843,654 shares to 8,846,301,754 shares.

title: PT Lintas Benua Sells 144,614,496 Shares of PT Ketrosden Triasmitra Tbk
body: PT Lintas Benua has sold 144,614,496 shares of PT Ketrosden Triasmitra Tbk (KETR.JK). The transaction occurred on December 19, 2025, with shares trading at IDR 300 per share. Following the sale, PT Lintas Benua's holdings decreased from 712,867,083 to 568,252,587 shares.

title: Martin Suharlie Buys 365,000 Shares of PT M Cash Integrasi Tbk
body: Martin Suharlie acquired 365,000 shares of PT M Cash Integrasi Tbk (MCAS.JK) on December 19, 2025. The transaction was executed at a price of IDR 609 per share. Following this purchase, Suharlie's holdings increased from 70,311,200 shares to 70,676,200 shares.

title: 1 Inti Dot Com Buys 826,200 Shares of PT M Cash Integrasi Tbk
body: 1 Inti Dot Com acquired 826,200 shares of PT M Cash Integrasi Tbk (MCAS.JK) on December 19, 2025. The transaction was executed at a price of IDR 675 per share. Following the purchase, 1 Inti Dot Com's holdings increased by 826,200 shares, bringing their total to 116,992,200 shares.

title: Ascendia Capital Indonesia Buys 144,614,496 Shares of PT Ketrosden Triasmitra Tbk
body: Ascendia Capital Indonesia has acquired 144,614,496 shares of PT Ketrosden Triasmitra Tbk (KETR.JK) on December 19, 2025. The transaction was executed at a price of IDR 300 per share. Following the purchase, Ascendia Capital Indonesia now holds 144,614,496 shares.

title: Andreas Utomo Sells 41 Million Shares of PT Aman Agrindo Tbk
body: Andreas Utomo has divested 41,000,000 shares of PT Aman Agrindo Tbk (GULA.JK). The transaction, executed at an average price of IDR 290.18 per share, reduces his total holdings from 164,393,100 shares to 123,393,100 shares.

title: Pantai Indah Kapuk Dua Tbk Buys CBDK.JK Shares Worth IDR 2.27 Billion
body: Pantai Indah Kapuk Dua Tbk has acquired shares of PT Bangun Kosambi Sukses Tbk (CBDK.JK) for IDR 2,270,158,968. The transaction involved purchasing shares at IDR 6,450 per share. Following the acquisition, Pantai Indah Kapuk Dua Tbk's holdings increased from 2,602,050,000 to 4,872,208,968 shares.

title: Tunas Mekar Jaya Sells 116,422,179 CBDK.JK Shares
body: Tunas Mekar Jaya has sold 116,422,179 shares of PT Bangun Kosambi Sukses Tbk (CBDK.JK). The transaction occurred on December 19, 2025, with shares sold at IDR 6,450.0 each. Following the sale, Tunas Mekar Jaya's holdings decreased from 1,250,000,000 to 85,778,210 shares.

title: Multi Artha Pratama Buys Stake in PT Pantai Indah Kapuk Dua Tbk.
body: Multi Artha Pratama has acquired shares in PT Pantai Indah Kapuk Dua Tbk. (PANI.JK) through a transaction valued at IDR 385,356,454. The purchase was made at a price of IDR 12,975 per share. Following the transaction, Multi Artha Pratama's holdings increased from 14,838,980,935 to 15,224,337,389 shares.
company_name: PT Pantai Indah Kapuk Dua Tbk.

title: Garuda Multi Investama Buys 45 Million Shares of PT Garuda Metalindo Tbk.
body: Garuda Multi Investama has acquired 45,000,000 shares of PT Garuda Metalindo Tbk. (BOLT.JK) at a price of IDR 1,000 per share. This transaction increases their total holdings from 1,350,000,000 shares to 1,395,000,000 shares.

title: Infiniti Wahana Sells 587,900 Shares of Steady Safe Tbk
body: Infiniti Wahana has sold 587,900 shares of Steady Safe Tbk (SAFE.JK) at a price of IDR 444 per share. Following the transaction, their holdings decreased from 464,597,013 shares to 464,009,113 shares.
